item.description: Architecture applies just as much in software as it does in buildings.

item.title: About Me.
item.description: My name is Ibnu Ahsani, a software engineer from Jakarta, Indonesia. I graduated college in 2020 and have a bachelor’s degree in computer science from Padjadjaran University. As of 2021, I have less than a year of experience under my belt, so technically that still makes me a “fresh graduate” :). I’m currently unemployed after working as a backend engineer at kiddo.id for ten months. My tasks were to create a content management system, as well as maintain, and improve their marketplace system.
